analysis.description:
HoldableToken.adminHold (/unique_chucks/13/0x1e95efa7e57dbdcfbc6f4aac26d2be0bca3a7bc3.sol#232-242) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-HoldAssistant(holdAssistantAddr).adminHold(msg.sender,balanceOf(msg.sender),_status) (/unique_chucks/13/0x1e95efa7e57dbdcfbc6f4aac26d2be0bca3a7bc3.sol#237-240)
